Tasks: Hold Internal Pre-Kick Off: Talk through study overview, roles, deadlines, and any other key project info prior to KO with client.
Create or review Proposal based on RFP (Request For Proposal)
Create a job folder for the study in the 'Proposals' folder (within appropriate client folder)
Save vendors' bids to job folder
Ensure any new vendors you are bringing on board have signed the NDA
Create Internal Cost Worksheet, send to supervisor
Move study docs from 'Proposals' folder to main client folder
Set up Invoice Schedule & Worksheet (Reference PO/SOW for client specific invoice timeline)
Alert sample/programming vendor that the project is moving forward
After client KO call, confirm final sample quotas with vendor

Ongoing.task: Keep internal team aligned on roles, deliverables, and client expectations throughout kickoff.
Ongoing.description: Maintain team alignment and communication throughout the kickoff phase

Tasks: Add AE submission forms & contact info to job folder
Submit first client invoice request to accounting
Make necessary revisions to QNR from client review
Send final QNR to vendor (after client sign off)
If advanced analytics needed: create specs & engage statistician
Ensure signed/final documents are saved to job folder
If translations: review translations in survey program
If requested: send tested survey link to client

Ongoing.task: Confirm all client expectations are documented before launch
Ongoing.description: Maintain documentation of client expectations throughout pre-field phase

Ongoing.task: Ensure version control across QNR revisions
Ongoing.description: Maintain version control and document management throughout QNR development

Tasks: Create report shell based on questionnaire, proposal, feedback from client
Share fielding updates with client - minimum of twice a week
Copy cost tracker shell to job folder and update
Send tab banner plan to vendor
If coding: share questions and required codes with vendor
Request invoice if required by client schedule

Ongoing.task: Soft data quality check (10% of total sample), continue quality checks throughout
Ongoing.description: Continuous data quality monitoring and validation throughout fielding

Ongoing.task: Monitor completes and update quotas as needed
Ongoing.description: Ongoing quota management and completion monitoring

Ongoing.task: Monitor open end comments for AEs and submit within 24 hours
Ongoing.description: Continuous AE monitoring and timely reporting

Ongoing.task: Ensure timely completion of field, troubleshoot as needed
Ongoing.description: Ongoing field management and issue resolution

Tasks: Internal download: lessons learned and notes
Save final raw data files to folder: raw excel file, SPSS file, verbatim file, etc.
Send final verbatim file to vendor for coding (if needed)
Send SPSS file to statistician (if applicable)
Clean project folder: move drafts, save finals

Ongoing.task: Confirm all deliverables are complete and documented for handoff to reporting
Ongoing.description: Ongoing deliverable tracking and documentation for reporting handoff

Tasks: Have exec summary and headlines proofed
Have full final report have a final review (for final sign off)
Update report based on client comments
Save vendor invoices, compare to bids, confirm costs
Fill out Cost Tracker with final invoices from vendors

Ongoing.task: Maintain consistent story flow and formatting across deliverables
Ongoing.description: Ongoing quality control for story consistency and formatting

Tasks: Hold Internal Pre-Kick Off: Talk through study overview, roles, deadlines, and any other key project info prior to KO with client.
Create or review Proposal based on RFP (Request For Proposal)
Create a job folder for the study in the 'Proposals' folder (within appropriate client folder)
Save vendors' bids to job folder
Ensure any new vendors have signed the NDA
Create Internal Cost Worksheet, send to supervisor
Move study docs from 'Proposals' folder to main client folder
Add AE submission forms & contact info to job folder
Alert recruiter and moderator that project is moving forward
Send discussion guide draft to client

Ongoing.task: Ensure alignment between internal team, moderator, and recruiter on study objectives
Ongoing.description: Maintain team alignment and objective clarity throughout kickoff

Tasks: Ensure signed documents are saved to job folder
Schedule DG walk-through with client and moderator
Copy Cost Tracker shell to job folder
Coordinate discussion guide updates from client
Send Outlook invites with respondent details and observer login info
Create notetaking schedule and align team
Schedule client debrief after first 1-2 interviews

Ongoing.task: Ensure communication between client, recruiter, and moderator stays open and current
Ongoing.description: Maintain open communication channels throughout pre-field phase

Tasks: Create report shell based on discussion guide and objectives

Ongoing.task: Continue updating report shell with interview content
Ongoing.description: Ongoing report shell updates with interview content

Ongoing.task: Submit AE reports within 24 hours
Ongoing.description: Continuous AE monitoring and timely reporting

Ongoing.task: Manage stimuli changes
Ongoing.description: Ongoing stimuli management and updates

Ongoing.task: Download audio files and transcripts daily
Ongoing.description: Daily audio and transcript management

Ongoing.task: Track high-level findings for client
Ongoing.description: Continuous findings tracking and client updates

Ongoing.task: Ensure objectives are being met
Ongoing.description: Ongoing objective monitoring and validation

Ongoing.task: Engage with moderator and ask probes
Ongoing.description: Continuous moderator engagement and probing

Tasks: Internal download: all audio files, CA, transcripts, lessons, and notes

Ongoing.task: Document learnings and summarize key qualitative themes
Ongoing.description: Ongoing documentation of learnings and theme identification

Tasks: Update report based on client comments
Save vendor invoices and submit to accounting

Ongoing.task: Focus on storytelling clarity and actionable insights
Ongoing.description: Ongoing focus on clear storytelling and actionable insights

Ongoing.task: Ensure findings tie back to research objectives
Ongoing.description: Continuous alignment of findings with research objectives
